channel.title: Server on Eric's Web.site
channel.description: Recent content in Server on Eric's Web.site

item.title: The Case of the Circular Dependency
item.description: As some know, I keep a personal server. I’ve developed tales of my (mis)adventures and the things I’ve learned from them. I found this one humorous. Why? The root cause. My hard drive is too fast. I’ll start at the beginning. If you’re not into computers, I’ll explain things in a way that hopefully anyone can understand, but to be honest I’m not sure if you’ll get a lot out of it.
